title: Peter Peverelli, “One Turbulent Year – China 1975” (Boekscout, 2013)
description:
China today attracts one of the largest foreign student populations in the world. In 1975, though, very few foreign students were allowed to study in then-isolated China, especially Western students. But, Dr. Peter Peverelli was a part of a small cohort of students who studied in Beijing Language Institute at...
